posts.post_content: Best Seal imo. Seal of [Shock](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shock) is great because you can drop it turn 1 even if you go first and save your [lightning bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lightning bolt) to pop a 5 toughness creature for instead of a 3 toughness. Good for planning, great if you wanna run enchantments cause it's early threat that can get rid of a destroy enchantment if they want to do it preemptively so you don't pop their BSA. Very, very solid card.
posts.html:
Best Seal imo. Seal of Shock is great because you can drop it turn 1 even if you go first and save your lightning bolt to pop a 5 toughness creature for instead of a 3 toughness. Good for planning, great if you wanna run enchantments cause it's early threat that can get rid of a destroy enchantment if they want to do it preemptively so you don't pop their BSA. Very, very solid card.

Posted By: Bursama (1/19/2011 11:35:24 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The seals are great in multiplayer. This one can just hang out daring someone to play a creature or to attack with those that you have let survive. They let you punish people for trying to kill it, or for for doing something mean to you. And of course you have some fiery defense without needing to leave any mana open. If this is on the table for 5 rounds, then you probably got a lot of value out of it sitting there.   
  
There are not a huge number of quality red cards that will survive a [Jokulhaups](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jokulhaups), but this is one of them.
posts.html:
The seals are great in multiplayer. This one can just hang out daring someone to play a creature or to attack with those that you have let survive. They let you punish people for trying to kill it, or for for doing something mean to you. And of course you have some fiery defense without needing to leave any mana open. If this is on the table for 5 rounds, then you probably got a lot of value out of it sitting there.

There are not a huge number of quality red cards that will survive a Jokulhaups, but this is one of them.
